text:
Sasha Fierce is back and killing us with her new track, "Girls (Who Run The World)." The single is the first from her highly anticipated fourth studio album.

The song is a high-energy track with a mix of go-go and marching band beats that hits you like a powerful punch. Beyonce is known for her women-empowerment songs, so I guess it was only right that this anthem was chosen as the premiere single from her new album.

She took a mini break from the music scene, but she is ready to retake her place on the music industry's throne. And with songs like this, she'll be welcomed back with open arms.

Check out the full version of the leaked song below. Are you feeling it?
title: New Beyonce track, 'Girls (Who Run The World)'
